- On-chain player statistics tracking - Piece capture with instant cUSD rewards - Game timeout protection - Comprehensive game history","errors":{"ECDSAInvalidSignature()":[{"details":"The signature cancelled"},"GameCreated(uint256,address)":{"details":"Emitted when a new game is created"},"GameEnded(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when a game ends normally"},"GameTimedOut(uint256,address)":{"details":"Emitted when a game is won by timeout"},"PieceCaptured(uint256,address,uint8,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when a piece is captured (gasless via paymaster)"},"PlayerJoined(uint256,address)":{"details":"Emitted when a player joins an existing game"},"SessionAuthorized(uint256,address)":{"details":"Emitted when a player's session is authorized"},"StatsUpdated(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when player statistics are updated"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"cancelGame(uint256)":{"details":"Cancel a waiting game (only creator can cancel) Allows cancellation if no opponent joins within 5 minutes","params":{"gameId":"The game ID to cancel Requirements: - Game must be in WAITING status - Caller must be the game creator - At least 5 minutes must have passed since creation Effects: - Changes status to CANCELLED - Refunds escrow to creator - Emits GameCancelled event"}},"capturePiecePaymaster(uint256,address,uint8,bytes)":{"details":"Capture a chess piece with gasless execution via paymaster Only callable by the EntryPoint contract (account abstraction)","params":{"captor":"The player capturing the piece","gameId":"The game ID","pieceType":"The type of piece being captured","signature":"Signature authorizing the capture Requirements: - Must be called by EntryPoint contract - Game must be ACTIVE - Captor must be authorized for the game - Valid signature from captor - Capture not previously processed Effects: - Transfers piece value from captured player to captor - Updates last move timestamp - Prevents duplicate captures - Emits PieceCaptured event"}},"claimTimeout(uint256)":{"details":"Claim victory by timeout when opponent doesn't move Can be called after GAME_TIMEOUT has passed since last move","params":{"gameId":"The game ID to claim timeout for Requirements: - Game must be ACTIVE - Caller must be a player in the game - GAME_TIMEOUT must have passed since last move Effects: - Declares caller as winner - Updates player statistics for both players - Adds game to both players' history - Transfers final balances to players - Emits GameTimedOut, GameEnded, and StatsUpdated events"}},"constructor":{"details":"Initialize the contract with EntryPoint address","params":{"_entryPoint":"The EntryPoint contract address for account abstraction"}},"createGameWithSession(bytes)":{"details":"Create a new game with session authorization (single signature) Combines session key authorization and game creation in one transaction","params":{"sessionSignature":"Signature authorizing session for the new game"},"returns":{"_0":"gameId The ID of the newly created game Requirements: - Valid session signature from msg.sender - Sufficient cUSD allowance for ESCROW_AMOUNT - Transfers ESCROW_AMOUNT to contract Effects: - Creates new game with WAITING status - Authorizes msg.sender for gasless gameplay - Emits GameCreated and SessionAuthorized events"}},"endGame(uint256,address)":{"details":"End a game and update player statistics Can be called by either player when the game is complete","params":{"gameId":"The game ID to end","winner":"The address of the winning player Requirements: - Game must be ACTIVE - Caller must be a player in the game - Winner must be one of the players Effects: - Updates player statistics for both players - Adds game to both players' history - Transfers final balances to players - Emits GameEnded and StatsUpdated events"}},"getGame(uint256)":{"details":"Get comprehensive game information","params":{"gameId":"The game ID to query"},"returns":{"createdAt":"Game creation timestamp","lastMoveAt":"Last move timestamp","player1":"First player address","player1Balance":"Current balance of player1","player2":"Second player address","player2Balance":"Current balance of player2","status":"Current game status","winner":"Winner address (zero if not finished)"}},"getPieceValue(uint8)":{"details":"Get the monetary value of a chess piece","params":{"pieceType":"The type of chess piece"},"returns":{"_0":"The cUSD value of the piece (18 decimals)"}},"getPlayerGameCount(address)":{"details":"Get total number of games played by a player","params":{"player":"The player address to query"},"returns":{"_0":"Total number of games in player's history"}},"getPlayerGameHistory(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Get paginated game history for a player Returns newest games first (reverse chronological order)","params":{"limit":"Maximum number of games to return","offset":"Number of games to skip (for pagination)","player":"The player address to query"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of game IDs"}},"getPlayerStats(address)":{"details":"Get comprehensive player statistics","params":{"player":"The player address to query"},"returns":{"gamesLost":"Total games lost","gamesPlayed":"Total games participated in","gamesWon":"Total games won","totalEarned":"Total cUSD earned from wins","totalLost":"Total cUSD lost from losses","winRate":"Win rate percentage (0-100)"}},"isAuthorized(uint256,address)":{"details":"Check if a player is authorized for gasless gameplay","params":{"gameId":"The game ID to check","player":"The player address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"True if player is authorized, false otherwise"}},"isCaptureProcessed(uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"Check if a capture has already been processed Prevents duplicate capture processing","params":{"captureId":"The unique capture identifier","gameId":"The game ID to check"},"returns":{"_0":"True if capture was processed, false otherwise"}},"joinGameWithSession(uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Join an existing game with session authorization (single signature) Combines session key authorization and game joining in one transaction","params":{"gameId":"The ID of the game to join","sessionSignature":"Signature authorizing session for the game Requirements: - Game must be in WAITING status - Caller cannot be the game creator - Valid session signature from msg.sender - Sufficient cUSD allowance for ESCROW_AMOUNT Effects: - Adds player2 to the game - Changes status to ACTIVE - Authorizes msg.sender for gasless gameplay - Emits PlayerJoined and SessionAuthorized events"}}},"stateVariables":{"CUSD_TOKEN":{"details":"cUSD token address on Celo Alfajores testnet"},"ESCROW_AMOUNT":{"details":"Escrow amount required from each player to start a game"},"GAME_TIMEOUT":{"details":"Maximum time between moves before game can be claimed as timeout"},"PAWN_VALUE":{"details":"Monetary value of each chess piece in cUSD (18 decimals)"},"authorized":{"details":"Mapping from game ID to player authorization status"},"cUSD":{"details":"ERC20 token interface for cUSD"},"entryPoint":{"details":"EntryPoint interface for account abstraction"},"gameCounter":{"details":"Counter for generating unique game IDs"},"games":{"details":"Mapping from game ID to game data"},"playerGameHistory":{"details":"Mapping from player address to their game history (game IDs)"},"playerStats":{"details":"Mapping from player address to their statistics"},"processedCaptures":{"details":"Mapping to prevent duplicate capture processing"}},"title":"MiniChessEscrowPaymaster","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"This contract enables gasless chess gameplay on Celo with cUSD cancelGame(uint256).details: Cancel a waiting game (only creator can cancel) Allows cancellation if no opponent joins within 5 minutes

params.gameId: The game ID to cancel Requirements: - Game must be in WAITING status - Caller must be the game creator - At least 5 minutes must have passed since creation Effects: - Changes status to CANCELLED - Refunds escrow to creator - Emits GameCancelled event

capturePiecePaymaster(uint256,address,ui.details: Capture a chess piece with gasless execution via paymaster Only callable by the EntryPoint contract (account abstraction)

params.pieceType: The type of piece being captured
params.signature: Signature authorizing the capture Requirements: - Must be called by EntryPoint contract - Game must be ACTIVE - Captor must be authorized for the game - Valid signature from captor - Capture not previously processed Effects: - Transfers piece value from captured player to captor - Updates last move timestamp - Prevents duplicate captures - Emits PieceCaptured event

claimTimeout(uint256).details: Claim victory by timeout when opponent doesn't move Can be called after GAME_TIMEOUT has passed since last move

params.gameId: The game ID to claim timeout for Requirements: - Game must be ACTIVE - Caller must be a player in the game - GAME_TIMEOUT must have passed since last move Effects: - Declares caller as winner - Updates player statistics for both players - Adds game to both players' history - Transfers final balances to players - Emits GameTimedOut, GameEnded, and StatsUpdated events

constructor.details: Initialize the contract with EntryPoint address

params._entryPoint: The EntryPoint contract address for account abstraction

createGameWithSession(bytes).details: Create a new game with session authorization (single signature) Combines session key authorization and game creation in one transaction

params.sessionSignature: Signature authorizing session for the new game

returns._0: gameId The ID of the newly created game Requirements: - Valid session signature from msg.sender - Sufficient cUSD allowance for ESCROW_AMOUNT - Transfers ESCROW_AMOUNT to contract Effects: - Creates new game with WAITING status - Authorizes msg.sender for gasless gameplay - Emits GameCreated and SessionAuthorized events

endGame(uint256,address).details: End a game and update player statistics Can be called by either player when the game is complete

params.winner: The address of the winning player Requirements: - Game must be ACTIVE - Caller must be a player in the game - Winner must be one of the players Effects: - Updates player statistics for both players - Adds game to both players' history - Transfers final balances to players - Emits GameEnded and StatsUpdated events

getPieceValue(uint8).details: Get the monetary value of a chess piece

returns._0: The cUSD value of the piece (18 decimals)

getPlayerGameCount(address).details: Get total number of games played by a player

returns._0: Total number of games in player's history

getPlayerGameHistory(address,uint256,uin.details: Get paginated game history for a player Returns newest games first (reverse chronological order)

params.limit: Maximum number of games to return
params.offset: Number of games to skip (for pagination)

isAuthorized(uint256,address).details: Check if a player is authorized for gasless gameplay

returns._0: True if player is authorized, false otherwise

isCaptureProcessed(uint256,bytes32).details: Check if a capture has already been processed Prevents duplicate capture processing

returns._0: True if capture was processed, false otherwise

joinGameWithSession(uint256,bytes).details: Join an existing game with session authorization (single signature) Combines session key authorization and game joining in one transaction

params.gameId: The ID of the game to join
params.sessionSignature: Signature authorizing session for the game Requirements: - Game must be in WAITING status - Caller cannot be the game creator - Valid session signature from msg.sender - Sufficient cUSD allowance for ESCROW_AMOUNT Effects: - Adds player2 to the game - Changes status to ACTIVE - Authorizes msg.sender for gasless gameplay - Emits PlayerJoined and SessionAuthorized events
